## Article Submission

Thank you for contributing to the Agent Management Forum!

### Article Details

**Article Title**: <!-- Your article title here -->

**Author**: <!-- Your name / author slug -->

### Checklist

Please ensure you have completed the following before submitting:

- [ ] I have created or updated my author profile in `src/content/authors/`
- [ ] My author profile includes required fields: `name` and `bio`
- [ ] I have added my article to `src/content/articles/`
- [ ] My article includes all required frontmatter fields:
  - [ ] `title` (max 120 characters)
  - [ ] `description` (max 300 characters)
  - [ ] `author` (matches my author file slug)
  - [ ] `date` (YYYY-MM-DD format)
  - [ ] `tags` (1-5 tags as array)
- [ ] File names use kebab-case (lowercase with hyphens)
- [ ] I have run `npm run build` locally and it passes without errors
- [ ] My article content is relevant to AI agents, multi-agent systems, or related topics
- [ ] I have properly attributed any external sources
- [ ] If this is a repost, I have included the `original_url` field
